column4: you could also just let it load on the web page and then save page as I believe
this is for websites that don't have a direct link in their page. like pages that call files from a php script or something
so i can't save-as
oh I just clicked on that planetquake link, I thought that's the one you wanted
yeah it's what i want, but i can't save-as because it won't load all the way and lags out. so i just need it to download like a regular file
is that how most people do it though? just wait for it to load on the page and save-as?  what about for really large files?
well no, you can change the setting.  But if you are having trouble, you can load the page... see the url.. and then wget it
load the page, see the url hm ok...
for example, I see: ftp://quake3files.com/linuxq3apoint-1.32.x86.run
i cant use wget because it says logging in as anonymous and there is no anonymous
I think that would be best (actually changing the setting) but I believe there is also an extension that will let you enter url's to download
but I don't have the authentication information that the php page is apparently sending to the server
so any kind of file download manager would have to borrow that
oh, flashgot is an extension for firefox by the way
well I just tried downloading with flashgot using d4x as the download manager and it works.  I thought you could change the setting, but I am getting a different opinion from #firefox
ok, so d4x as a download manager... ok. i've never had to use download managers before.
do you want me to send you this?  or can I just delete
i would like the file, but I also want to learn how to do this so i stop having this problem. how do you want to transfer it?
pm me?
sure.  I haven't tried dcc on xchat yet, let's see how it goes
xie xie ni
